quest.name: An Honest Day's Work
journal: Hidden Hearth is searching for someone willing to do a spot of hard labor.
objectives: Deliver the Thavnairian limestone to Bent Frond.
Scatter the Thavnairian limestone at the designated location.

dialogue.name: HIDDENHEARTH
dialogue.text: Would you be up for doing some heavy lifting on my behalf? One of the wheels came clean off my cart the other day.

dialogue.name: HIDDENHEARTH
dialogue.text: You'll find four sacks up in the storage area. Give them to my sister, Bent Frond. She works at Byron's Bread.

dialogue.name: HIDDENHEARTH
dialogue.text: You'll find four sacks up in the storage area. Give them to my sister, Bent Frond. She works at Byron's Bread. Ask her about getting compensated for your work.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Got business with me, have you?

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Ah, thank you. I had been wondering when Sister would get these to me.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: I know you must be tired, but would you mind scattering these limestones around the fields here? I'll pay you extra for the work, of course.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Open up the sacks you brought here and scatter the limestone evenly all over the fields.

dialogue.name: HIDDENHEARTH
dialogue.text: You have delivered the limestone to my sister? Fantastic. Make sure she doesn't forget to reward you for your work.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Open up the sacks you brought here and scatter the limestone evenly all over the fields.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Fine work. Here is your reward as promised.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Gyr Abania is not blessed with the most fertile of fields. Nothing would grow if we didn't spread fertilizer around from time to time like this.

dialogue.name: BENTFROND
dialogue.text: Likewise, our village wouldn't exist if it were not for the quarry, but we cannot expect it to provide for us any longer.
